summary: Diff primarily adds global Radix Dialog/AlertDialog/Sheet overlay and content styling in `frontend/src/index.css` (stronger dimming, solid modal surfaces, z-index), and updates several dialog/sheet usages plus app shell header/nav styling/z-index to reduce visual overlap. However, the diff also includes multiple unrelated feature/UI changes (e.g., backup import/export hooks/module, finance reporting enhancements, login/footer version labels) that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin backup export/import module and related data parsing (including BigInt serialization/deserialization) and dialogs.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly scopes changes to UI clarity/background layering and forbids adding unrelated domain behavior changes; backup export/import is new functionality unrelated to overlay clarity.

hallucinated_features.description: New/modified backup React Query hooks with cache invalidation across many domain queries after import.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-16/REQ-17 and extends application behavior beyond UI layering.

hallucinated_features.description: Finance module additions/changes: multiple printable reports and product search inputs filtering report rows.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest non-goals include changing ERP domain behavior and focuses only on overlay/modal/drawer clarity.

hallucinated_features.description: Login page density changes and displaying a "Version 36" label; footer also displays "Version 36".
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the UI overlay clarity requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Bluetooth printer requirements dialog includes print-window HTML/CSS generation and printing flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-16/REQ-17; unrelated feature work.
